thread.title: James Gipson
thread.title_full: Restaurant Equipment Club reviewed by James Gipson

author: James Gipson
title: James Gipson
text: This wonderful, knowledgeable and caring person made my commercial job with a very big client of ours very happy. This is a very large project for us and we needed a lot of assistance to make it work. Cecelia was just that person for us. I called on her several times and she always went above what I expected to help.. Great Job young lady and for Captive Air, you are very lucky to have some one like Cecelia on your team.
